Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are travelling along Lankshire Parkway, north of Waterfront Way.
Room.LongDescription: Lankshire Parkway runs between the Klondike Wheat Fields on the east side of the road and the DeNail Corn Fields, on the west side of the road. To the south, you can see Waterfront Way intersecting Lankshire Parkway. Both the corn and wheat fields are more than happy to provide unskilled labor with some temporary jobs, plowing fields and scaring away the vermin that poison their crops.
